DeleteAssignedJobNumber.name: DeleteAssignedJobNumber
DeleteAssignedJobNumber.description: Assigns a User to a Job  Number

GetAssignedJobNumbers.name: GetAssignedJobNumbers
GetAssignedJobNumbers.description: Get all Job numbers logged in user is assigned to.
GetAssignedJobNumbers.queryString:
SELECT uj.fk_UserId, jn.JobNumber, js.SiteName, js.SiteCity, js.SiteState, jn.Status
FROM PSA.tblJobNumbers jn
	LEFT JOIN PSA.tblJobSites js
		ON js.ID = jn.fk_JobSiteID
	JOIN PSA.tblUserJobNumbers uj
		on uj.fk_JobNumber = jn.JobNumber AND uj.fk_UserId = :UserID
ORDER BY jn.JobNumber
GetAssignedJobNumbers.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT uj.fk_UserId, jn.JobNumber, js.SiteName, js.SiteCity, js.SiteState, jn.Status
FROM PSA.tblJobNumbers jn
	LEFT JOIN PSA.tblJobSites js
		ON js.ID = jn.fk_JobSiteID
	JOIN PSA.tblUserJobNumbers uj
		on uj.fk_JobNumber = jn.JobNumber AND uj.fk_UserId = :UserID
ORDER BY jn.JobNumber) wmTempTable

GetChatAllLastRead.name: GetChatAllLastRead
GetChatAllLastRead.description: Gets the timestamp of the last time the provided user viewed All Chat
GetChatAllLastRead.queryString:
SELECT TimeStamp 
FROM PSA.ChatAllLastRead
WHERE UserID = :UserID
GetChatAllLastRead.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT TimeStamp 
FROM PSA.ChatAllLastRead
WHERE UserID = :UserID) wmTempTable

GetChatAllLatestTimeStamp.name: GetChatAllLatestTimeStamp
GetChatAllLatestTimeStamp.description: Gets the timestamp of the newest Message in the AllChat conversation
GetChatAllLatestTimeStamp.queryString:
SELECT MAX(TimeStamp) AS LatestTimeStamp
FROM ChatMessages
WHERE ConversationID = 1
AND Author != :UserID
GetChatAllLatestTimeStamp.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT MAX(TimeStamp) AS LatestTimeStamp
FROM ChatMessages
WHERE ConversationID = 1
AND Author != :UserID) wmTempTable

GetChatConversationsByLoggedInUser.name: GetChatConversationsByLoggedInUser
GetChatConversationsByLoggedInUser.queryString:
SELECT tsc.*, cm2.Message AS LastMessage, cm2.Status, cm2.Author
FROM (
SELECT ccm1.ConversationID, ccm2.UserID AS RecipientUserID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, MAX(cm1.TimeStamp) AS Timestamp
FROM ChatConversationMembers ccm1

JOIN ChatConversationMembers ccm2
	on ccm2.ConversationID = ccm1.ConversationID AND ccm2.UserID != :UserID

JOIN tblUserPSA u
	on u.ID = ccm2.UserID
  
JOIN ChatMessages cm1
	ON cm1.ConversationID = ccm1.ConversationID


WHERE ccm1.UserID = :UserID
AND cm1.ConversationID != 1

GROUP BY ccm1.ConversationID
) tsc
JOIN ChatMessages cm2
	ON cm2.ConversationID = tsc.ConversationID AND cm2.TimeStamp = tsc.Timestamp
GetChatConversationsByLoggedInUser.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT tsc.*, cm2.Message AS LastMessage, cm2.Status, cm2.Author
FROM (
SELECT ccm1.ConversationID, ccm2.UserID AS RecipientUserID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, MAX(cm1.TimeStamp) AS Timestamp
FROM ChatConversationMembers ccm1

JOIN ChatConversationMembers ccm2
	on ccm2.ConversationID = ccm1.ConversationID AND ccm2.UserID != :UserID

JOIN tblUserPSA u
	on u.ID = ccm2.UserID
  
JOIN ChatMessages cm1
	ON cm1.ConversationID = ccm1.ConversationID


WHERE ccm1.UserID = :UserID
AND cm1.ConversationID != 1

GROUP BY ccm1.ConversationID
) tsc
JOIN ChatMessages cm2
	ON cm2.ConversationID = tsc.ConversationID AND cm2.TimeStamp = tsc.Timestamp) wmTempTable

GetChatMessagesByConversationID.name: GetChatMessagesByConversationID
GetChatMessagesByConversationID.queryString:
SELECT cm.UID, cm.ConversationID, cm.Author, cm.Message, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email ,cm.TimeStamp
FROM ChatMessages cm
JOIN tblUserPSA u
	ON u.ID = cm.Author
WHERE ConversationID = :ConversationID
Order BY cm.UID
GetChatMessagesByConversationID.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT cm.UID, cm.ConversationID, cm.Author, cm.Message, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email ,cm.TimeStamp
FROM ChatMessages cm
JOIN tblUserPSA u
	ON u.ID = cm.Author
WHERE ConversationID = :ConversationID
Order BY cm.UID) wmTempTable

GetChatRecipientName.name: GetChatRecipientName
GetChatRecipientName.queryString:
SELECT u.ID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM ChatConversationMembers ccm
JOIN tblUserPSA u
    ON u.ID = ccm.UserID
WHERE ConversationID = :ConversationID
AND UserID != :UserID
GetChatRecipientName.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT u.ID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM ChatConversationMembers ccm
JOIN tblUserPSA u
    ON u.ID = ccm.UserID
WHERE ConversationID = :ConversationID
AND UserID != :UserID) wmTempTable

GetDefaultJobNumber.name: GetDefaultJobNumber
GetDefaultJobNumber.description: Gets the default job number assigned to the logged in user
GetDefaultJobNumber.queryString:
SELECT u.fk_DefaultJobNumberId
FROM tblUserPSA u
WHERE ID = :UserID
GetDefaultJobNumber.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT u.fk_DefaultJobNumberId
FROM tblUserPSA u
WHERE ID = :UserID) wmTempTable

GetFBNotesByFBID.name: GetFBNotesByFBID
GetFBNotesByFBID.description: Gets all Feedback notes for a given feedbackID
GetFBNotesByFBID.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.FeedBackNotes
WHERE fk_FeedBackID = :FeedbackID) wmTempTable

GetFBSubTypeByType.name: GetFBSubTypeByType
GetFBSubTypeByType.description: get the feedback sub types By Type
GetFBSubTypeByType.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_FB_SubTypes
WHERE fk_FBType = :FBType) wmTempTable

GetForemenBySuper.name: GetForemenBySuper
GetForemenBySuper.description: Get all Foremen assigned to Crews with selected Superintendent
GetForemenBySuper.queryString:
SELECT u.ID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, tc.CrewNumber
FROM PSA.tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	on tc.Foreman = u.ID
WHERE tc.Superintendent = :SuperID
GetForemenBySuper.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT u.ID, u.FirstName, u.LastName, u.Email, tc.CrewNumber
FROM PSA.tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	on tc.Foreman = u.ID
WHERE tc.Superintendent = :SuperID) wmTempTable

GetHelpMenuVideos.name: GetHelpMenuVideos
GetHelpMenuVideos.description: Get the Help Menu Video tree
GetHelpMenuVideos.queryString:
SELECT m.ID AS CategoryID, sm.ID AS SubCategoryID, m.label AS Category, sm.label AS SubCategory, sm.title, sm.fileName
FROM PSA.MenuHelpVideos m
JOIN PSA.MenuSubHelpVideos sm
	ON sm.fk_ParentMenu = m.ID
ORDER BY m.ID, sm.ID
GetHelpMenuVideos.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT m.ID AS CategoryID, sm.ID AS SubCategoryID, m.label AS Category, sm.label AS SubCategory, sm.title, sm.fileName
FROM PSA.MenuHelpVideos m
JOIN PSA.MenuSubHelpVideos sm
	ON sm.fk_ParentMenu = m.ID
ORDER BY m.ID, sm.ID) wmTempTable

GetJobNumberCountByJobNumber.name: GetJobNumberCountByJobNumber
GetJobNumberCountByJobNumber.description: Checks to see if the Job Number exists
GetJobNumberCountByJobNumber.queryString:
SELECT count(JobNumber) AS JobNumberCount
FROM PSA.tblJobNumbers
WHERE JobNumber = :JobNumber
GetJobNumberCountByJobNumber.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT count(JobNumber) AS JobNumberCount
FROM PSA.tblJobNumbers
WHERE JobNumber = :JobNumber) wmTempTable

GetJobSites.name: GetJobSites
GetJobSites.description: Search through for all matching Job Sites
GetJobSites.queryString:
SELECT * 
FROM PSA.tblJobSites
WHERE SiteName = :SiteName
AND SiteCity = :City
AND SiteState = :State
GetJobSites.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.tblJobSites
WHERE SiteName = :SiteName
AND SiteCity = :City
AND SiteState = :State) wmTempTable

GetPSAUsers.name: GetPSAUsers
GetPSAUsers.description: Gets all PSA users BY JobNumber
GetPSAUsers.queryString:
SELECT u.*, rd.Discipline
FROM tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN REF_Disciplines rd
    ON rd.ID = u.fk_DisciplineId
WHERE u.Id != 1
GetPSAUsers.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT u.*, rd.Discipline
FROM tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN REF_Disciplines rd
    ON rd.ID = u.fk_DisciplineId
WHERE u.Id != 1) wmTempTable

GetRefPrecipitation.name: GetRefPrecipitation
GetRefPrecipitation.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_Weather
WHERE Label = 'Precipitation') wmTempTable

GetRefTemperatures.name: GetRefTemperatures
GetRefTemperatures.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_Weather
WHERE Label = 'Temperature') wmTempTable

GetRefWind.name: GetRefWind
GetRefWind.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_Weather
WHERE Label = 'Wind') wmTempTable

GetRolesByDiscipline.name: GetRolesByDiscipline
GetRolesByDiscipline.description: Get all  valid Roles for selected Discipline
GetRolesByDiscipline.queryString:
SELECT r.* 
FROM PSA.REF_Roles r
WHERE r.RoleName LIKE CONCAT('%',(SELECT Discipline FROM PSA.REF_Disciplines WHERE ID = :DisciplineID),'%')
AND r.ID NOT IN (1)
GetRolesByDiscipline.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT r.* 
FROM PSA.REF_Roles r
WHERE r.RoleName LIKE CONCAT('%',(SELECT Discipline FROM PSA.REF_Disciplines WHERE ID = :DisciplineID),'%')
AND r.ID NOT IN (1)) wmTempTable

GetSettingDashUpdateInt.name: GetSettingDashUpdateInt
GetSettingDashUpdateInt.queryString:
SELECT s1.Value2 AS Interval1, s2.Value2 AS Interval2
FROM SETTINGS s1
LEFT JOIN SETTINGS s2
    ON s2.Label = "DashUpdateInt2"
WHERE s1.Label = "DashUpdateInt1"
GetSettingDashUpdateInt.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT s1.Value2 AS Interval1, s2.Value2 AS Interval2
FROM SETTINGS s1
LEFT JOIN SETTINGS s2
    ON s2.Label = "DashUpdateInt2"
WHERE s1.Label = "DashUpdateInt1") wmTempTable

GetSteelActivityTypes.name: GetSteelActivityTypes
GetSteelActivityTypes.queryString:
SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_ActivityTypes at
WHERE at.ID BETWEEN 61 AND 69
GetSteelActivityTypes.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT * 
FROM PSA.REF_ActivityTypes at
WHERE at.ID BETWEEN 61 AND 69) wmTempTable

GetUsersForemen.name: GetUsersForemen
GetUsersForemen.description: Get foremen list by given inputs
GetUsersForemen.queryString:
SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c
    .GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
    ON c.GF = u.ID OR  c.Foreman = u.ID
WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
AND c.DisciplineId LIKE :DisciplineID
AND c.ProjectManager LIKE :PM
AND c.ConstructionManager LIKE :ConstM
AND c.SiteManager LIKE :SiteM
AND c.AreaManager LIKE :AreaM
AND c.Superintendent LIKE :Super
GetUsersForemen.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c
    .GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
    ON c.GF = u.ID OR  c.Foreman = u.ID
WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
AND c.DisciplineId LIKE :DisciplineID
AND c.ProjectManager LIKE :PM
AND c.ConstructionManager LIKE :ConstM
AND c.SiteManager LIKE :SiteM
AND c.AreaManager LIKE :AreaM
AND c.Superintendent LIKE :Super) wmTempTable

GetUsersManagers.name: GetUsersManagers
GetUsersManagers.description: Get all the managers on a specified Job
GetUsersManagers.queryString:
SELECT DISTINCT uc.FirstName, uc.LastName, uc.Email, uc.ID
FROM (
SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c.GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
	ON c.ProjectManager = u.ID OR  c.ConstructionManager = u.ID OR  c.SiteManager = u.ID OR  c.AreaManager = u.ID
WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
) uc
GetUsersManagers.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT uc.FirstName, uc.LastName, uc.Email, uc.ID
FROM (
SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c.GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
LEFT JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
	ON c.ProjectManager = u.ID OR  c.ConstructionManager = u.ID OR  c.SiteManager = u.ID OR  c.AreaManager = u.ID
WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
) uc) wmTempTable

GetUsersSupers.name: GetUsersSupers
GetUsersSupers.queryString:
SELECT DISTINCT uc.FirstName, uc.LastName, uc.Email, uc.ID
FROM (
SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c.GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
	ON c.Superintendent = u.ID 

WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
AND c.DisciplineId LIKE :DisciplineID
AND c.ProjectManager LIKE :PM
AND c.ConstructionManager LIKE :ConstM
AND c.SiteManager LIKE :SiteM
AND c.AreaManager LIKE :AreaM
) uc
GetUsersSupers.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT uc.FirstName, uc.LastName, uc.Email, uc.ID
FROM (
SELECT u.*,
c.CrewNumber, c.JobNumber, c.ProjectManager, c.ConstructionManager, c.SiteManager, c.AreaManager, c.Superintendent, c.GF, c.Foreman, c.Leadman, c.DisciplineId, (c.Rev) AS cRev
FROM `PSA`.tblUserPSA u
JOIN `PSA`.tblCrews c
	ON c.Superintendent = u.ID 

WHERE c.JobNumber = :JobNumber
AND c.DisciplineId LIKE :DisciplineID
AND c.ProjectManager LIKE :PM
AND c.ConstructionManager LIKE :ConstM
AND c.SiteManager LIKE :SiteM
AND c.AreaManager LIKE :AreaM
) uc) wmTempTable

InsertFeedbackNotes.name: InsertFeedbackNotes
InsertFeedbackNotes.description: Insert Feedback Notes to the last ticket created by the current logged in user.  (Ment to be ran directly after InsertFeedbackTicket)
InsertFeedbackNotes.queryString:
INSERT INTO `PSA`.`FeedBackNotes` (`fk_FeedBackID`, `fk_UserID`, `Notes`)
VALUES ((SELECT fb.ID 
FROM PSA.FeedBack fb
	INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(fb.TimeStamp) AS Latest 
				FROM PSA.FeedBack fb
				WHERE fb.fk_UserID = :UserID
                ) n
			ON n.Latest = TimeStamp), 
			:UserID,
			:Notes)

InsertFeedbackTicketNotes.name: InsertFeedbackTicketNotes
InsertFeedbackTicketNotes.description: Adds more notes to a given ticket

InsertLoginFailure.name: InsertLoginFailure
InsertLoginFailure.description: Insert a failed login attempt into the tblUserLoginTracker table
InsertLoginFailure.queryString:
INSERT INTO `PSA`.`tblUserLoginTracker` 
(`UserID`, `Email`, `LoginResult`, `FailedPassword`) 
VALUES ( COALESCE((SELECT ID FROM PSA.tblUserPSA WHERE Email LIKE :EnteredUsername),0), :EnteredUsername, 0, :EnteredPassword)

InsertLoginSuccess.name: InsertLoginSuccess
InsertLoginSuccess.description: Insert a Successful login attempt into the tblUserLoginTracker table
InsertLoginSuccess.queryString:
INSERT INTO `PSA`.`tblUserLoginTracker` 
(`UserID`, `Email`, `LoginResult`, `FailedPassword`) 
VALUES ( COALESCE((SELECT ID FROM PSA.tblUserPSA WHERE Email LIKE :EnteredUsername),0), :EnteredUsername, 1, 'N/A')

InsertUserAssignedApps.name: InsertUserAssignedApps
InsertUserAssignedApps.description: Blindly insert User Assigned app IDs

InsertUserCreds.name: InsertUserCreds
InsertUserCreds.description: Insert new user credentials into tblUserCreds

InsertUserPSA.name: InsertUserPSA
InsertUserPSA.description: Add new Record to UserPSA Table
InsertUserPSA.queryString:
INSERT INTO tblUserPSA (pciEmployeeId,FirstName,LastName, Email, Password, MobileUser, Active, LastModifiedBy, fk_DisciplineId, fk_CraftId, fk_CraftClassId, fk_RoleId, fk_DefaultJobNumberId, Rev)
VALUES(:PerformanceEmployeeID, :FirstName, :LastName, :Email, :Password, :MobileUser, :ActiveUser, :ModifiedBy, :DisciplineId, :CraftId, :CraftClassId, :RoleId, :JobNumber, 0)

Managers.name: Managers
Managers.description: Get a list of all users in a manager position on any crew by JobNumber
Managers.queryString:
SELECT DISTINCT u.ID, u.Firstname, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM tblUserPSA u 

LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	ON u.ID IN (tc.ProjectManager, tc.ConstructionManager, tc.SiteManager, tc.AreaManager)
WHERE tc.JobNumber = :JobNumber
Managers.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT u.ID, u.Firstname, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM tblUserPSA u 

LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	ON u.ID IN (tc.ProjectManager, tc.ConstructionManager, tc.SiteManager, tc.AreaManager)
WHERE tc.JobNumber = :JobNumber) wmTempTable

Superintendents.name: Superintendents
Superintendents.description: List of all Superintendents on specified JobNumber
Superintendents.queryString:
SELECT DISTINCT u.ID, u.Firstname, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM tblUserPSA u 

LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	ON u.ID = tc.Superintendent
WHERE tc.JobNumber = :JobNumber
Superintendents.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT u.ID, u.Firstname, u.LastName, u.Email 
FROM tblUserPSA u 

LEFT JOIN PSA.tblCrews tc
	ON u.ID = tc.Superintendent
WHERE tc.JobNumber = :JobNumber) wmTempTable

UpdateChatAllLastRead.name: UpdateChatAllLastRead
UpdateChatAllLastRead.description: sets the timestamp for when the user last viewed all chat
UpdateChatAllLastRead.queryString:
INSERT INTO `ChatAllLastRead` 
(`UserID`) VALUES (:UserID)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
UserID = :UserID

UpdateUserCredsUserName.name: UpdateUserCredsUserName
UpdateUserCredsUserName.description: Update tblUserCreds but only the UserName column... to leave password untouched.

UpdateUserPSA.name: UpdateUserPSA
UpdateUserPSA.description: Updates the User PSA table with supplied Inputs
UpdateUserPSA.queryString:
UPDATE tblUserPSA
SET 
pciEmployeeId = :PerformanceEmployeeId,
FirstName = :FirstName,
LastName = :LastName,
Nickname = :Nickname,
Email = :Email,
Active = :ActiveUser,
LastModifiedBy = :ModifiedBy,
fk_DisciplineId = :DisciplineId,
fk_CraftId = :CraftId,
fk_CraftClassId = :CraftClassId,
fk_RoleId = :RoleId,
fk_DefaultJobNumberId = :DefaultJobNumberId
WHERE ID= :UserID
